name: 3D Platformer (chef nico)
description:
3D Platformer Proposed Modifications:

1) I want to add a level where the player has to go through a set of moving platforms with objects to avoid to reach a boss in the next level that takes multiple hits and extra changes to kill.

2) I want to change all of UI of the game to be more of a different game feel and effect along with custom music created by me

3) I want to add different powerups such as a kill all on screen or insta-kill along with new enemies with different behaviors along with the boss as said in the first modifications.

Created by Nicolas Georgescu
